mapper.sql: id, name, imgurl, linkkind, imglink, ordernumb, type, isuse, kind,memo
mapper.select:
select
from ns_advertise where isuse = '0' and flag='1' and (unix_timestamp(now()) between unix_timestamp(start_time) and unix_timestamp(end_time)) = 1
and type=#{map.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by ordernumb,id asc
